title: BRIEF-Westgold Resources Says Bluebird Processing Plant At MGO Has Been Offline For 5 Days
text:
BRIEF-Westgold Resources Says Bluebird Processing Plant At MGO Has Been Offline For 5 Days

Commodities 6 minutes ago (Oct 08, 2019 12:20)

BRIEF-Westgold Resources Says Bluebird Processing Plant At MGO Has Been Offline For 5 Days Oct 8 (Reuters) - Westgold Resources Ltd : * BLUEBIRD PROCESSING PLANT AT MGO HAS BEEN OFFLINE FOR 5 DAYS, EXPECTS IT MAY TAKE A FURTHER 24-48 HOURS FOR MATTER TO BE RECTIFIED * INCIDENT LIKELY TO RESULT IN PROCESS LOSS OF 1 WEEK IN CURRENT QUARTER AND AN ESTIMATED 2,500 OUNCES SHORTFALL IN OUTPUT FROM MGO Source Text https://www.asx.com.au/asx/statistics/displayAnnouncement.do?display=pdf&idsId=02156568 Further company coverage: WGX.AX

BRIEF-Westgold Resources Says Bluebird Processing Plant At MGO Has Been Offline For 5 Days
